attributes.review: This app is fake news. The design is horrible, too many micro transactions and ads. It’s really slow and is barely usable. Overall, I hate it

attributes.review: I tried to be nice and “was gonna vote for him but because of this app my phone was acting up. It was glicking a lot and made my phone werid.😤and I got a phone call I said yes? It said I am know sending you a free women.?!?!😡

attributes.review: Full of ads. Wanting me to pay for basically ALL features of it. Instantly started receiving spam phone calls from China.

attributes.review: So it took 3 days to download and hacked my phone so I had to get a new one I hate this app with a outstanding passion and I’ll never get it again thanks for hacking my stuff😔
